data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Deepak, V., Khandekar, Akshay, Chaitanya, R., Karanth, Praveen (2018): Descriptions of two new endemic and cryptic species of Sitana Cuvier, 1829 from peninsular India. Zootaxa 4434 (2): 327-365, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4434.2.5|18 occurrences
